content: baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 16 with the red yarn tail sew the tail to the last segment of the body with the yellow spikes pointing upwards final touch using the 2 bamboo skewers mark 2 5cm 1 from the pointed end of the skewer add glue to the marked out pointed end and insert one of the skewers in between the head and first segment of the body and the other in between the last segment of the body and the tail copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 17 if you find the skewers to be too long cut to desired length for example the skewers i had were 30cm 12 in length so i have cut 15cm 6 from the glue point so 17 5cm 7 from tip of skewer optional you can embellish your dragon with shiny yarn or with small beads if you do not have skewers o use can chopsticks or o use string/yarn to create a hanging dragon perfect for mobiles copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 18 congratulations your chinese paper dragon is complete🐉 please feel free to share your creation on social media and tag @tsuisie wong @aterkierdefreya @buzzyhoneycrafts @craftsythumbsy @crochetttebycollette @crochettee @emma _ pitt @mazrosecreations @woollymely copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 19
